WRITING.TITLE: This stack of different colored papers

WRITING.TEXT: Right? I'm just trying to imagine sitting down and writing this and then thinking *"yeah that oughta set em straight"*
Hahaha thank you! I was procrastinating anyway so I figured why not. Typing it up made me realize even more the level of verysmart douche this guy pulled off too.
I was just coming onto hip hop heads to see if anyone posted the "Options" music video cause I didn't remember seeing it. Excited for this tape I love the shit he puts out
